divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside making a video of the moon. The previous night I made one and the moon was pulsating with a mechanical sound, I wanted to see if it would happen twice. It pulsated briefly but not as before. Similar to the night before I saw a very bright star that was moving this time from east to northwest, I tried to capture it on video but it went in the direction of the moon and disappeared. So started taking pictures, when I looked into the camera while holding down the button I saw a small bright object to the left of the moon I snapped several pictures. the object appeared only in the first, it appeared as though it was moving. I'll attach a photo of the Object in IMG 0079, the following photo IMG 0080 doesn't show the object. I don't know what happened to the object. I felt o.k because I have seen these things before. I had a very close sighting with a large Object a few years ago that shook me up. This object was very low very large, looked like something out of startreck movie, but now I'm not scared anymore. I realize that they somehow connect to thought, whenever I think about them I usually see them shortly. And I have had contacts with different types of beings, mostly while asleep.I've gotten over the fear so now I'm able to mention it.
Summary: I saw a glowing object going towards the moon looking like a ball of light
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around June 22nd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
